title: These Black Friday gifts for Mac lovers are all under $250
content:
This time of year, gift shopping is pretty much inevitable. Finding good-quality gifts that don’t also have a ludicrous price tag is doubly difficult when everyone else is looking for the same thing. That’s why this year, Macworld has Black Friday Discounts on gifts under $250. Take a peek at these 5 great budget deals for the Mac lovers in your world. 

Apple AirPods Pro (1st Generation)

These 1st gen AirPods come with all the bells and whistles that made them stand out among wireless earbuds. Active noise cancellation, custom fit, immaculate sound, force-sensitive controls, and integrated access to Siri message reader make these AirPods well worth the investment. 

Get the Apple AirPods Pro (1st Generation) for $183.99 (Reg. $249) with coupon code BFSAVE20.

Setapp: 1-Year Subscription

Even if you’re willing to pay for them, finding high-quality apps is so much work. Setapp does the finding for you and gives you access to 210+ endlessly useful ad-free, distraction-free apps. 

Get Setapp: 1-Year Subscription for $41.40 (Reg. $107) with coupon code BFSAVE40.

Lightkey Pro Plan: Lifetime Subscription

This AI-Powered writing tool analyzes your typing style and tone and predicts your thinking up to 12 words in advance, including punctuation. Race through your writing for those bland emails and long outlines alike, and it even works for non-touch typists! 

Get Lightkey Pro Plan: Lifetime Subscription for $$29.99 (Reg. $169) with coupon code  BFSAVE40.

PDF Expert Award-Winning Software: Lifetime Subscription

PDF Expert lets you read, edit, share, and annotate PDFs on your Mac without needing to convert to another file type. Perfect for taking notes in school, signing and editing documents, and anything else where PDFs are involved, this app is one of the best core tools you’re going to find for Mac. 

Get PDF Expert Award-Winning Software: Lifetime Subscription for $29.99 (Reg. $79).

Mobile Pixels TRIO MAX: Portable Dual Screen Laptop Monitor

You don’t have to envy dual-screen desktop monitors just because you use a laptop! This plug-and-play screen extension has HD resolution, super reactive data transmission, and can rotate for a presentation view! 

Get Mobile Pixels TRIO MAX: Portable Dual Screen Laptop Monitor for $239.19 with coupon code (Reg. $359) BFSAVE20.
